name: 14.20 - Installation of Steel beam Guardrail and End Treatments
template name: 14.20 - Installation of Steel beam Guardrail and End Treatments

name: 1 - Manufacture of steel  beam guardrail post, panel components and end treats are maufactured by an approved manufacturer
2 - Manufacture of steel  beam guardrail post, panel components and end treats are supplied by an approved supplier
3 - All the steel manufacturer test certificates shall be supplied to te Administrator. The Administrator shall review and approve the certificates.
4 - If test certificates are not available, the Contractor shall submit to the Administrator for approval a proposal for selecting samples for testing.
5 - All projects are to be supplied with a min. two extra posts and panels from each batch. The Administrator shall randomy select from each batch two post and two panels for Audit testing.
6 - Installation shall not commence until the Administrator has confirmed the materials tested match the material test certificates supplied.
7 - All welders must comply with the requirements of Clause 20.5.2 otherwise a TMR representative shall be present when macro samples are prepared to show conformorance
8 - Steel Beam guardrail installed in the locations shown in the design documentation and in accordance with the Standard Drawings
9 - Steel Posts driven into ground except where posts are to be driven into asphalt, concrete or rock.
10 - Where ground is asphalt, concrete or rock, a hole shall be excavated in accordane with Cl 20.6.2
11 - Terminals installed as per the design documentation
12 - Delinerators installed on steel beam guardrail in accordance with the MUTCD Part 2
14 - Adminstrator accepts guardrail installation as per the design documentation
Project Manager Verify that the Above has been Constructed according to Specification
Client Verify that the Above has been Constructed according to Specification
